Text:
Ahhhh.... The Memories...

Good times!

and a VERY good up.... 

Thanks ThorntonWilde for this trip down memory lane!

been lookin for this in movie houses for bout 10 yrs never could find it but found it here on tpb though i remeber watching it and being amased at how good it was back in the day!one of my favs a classic!  didnt know it was a 1984 movie though didnt think it was that old well hope it d/l with no prob!
